gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: International Surface Temperature Initiative (ISTI) Global Land Surface Temperature Databank - Stage 2 Monthly

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: DOC/NOAA/NESDIS/NCEI > National Centers for Environmental Information, NESDIS, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce
International Surface Temperature Initiative

gmd:name.gco:CharacterString: International Surface Temperature Initiative Home Page

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: International Surface Temperature Initiative Home Page

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: International Surface Temperature Initiative

gmd:name.gco:CharacterString: International Surface Temperature Initiative Home Page

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: International Surface Temperature Initiative Home Page

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: The global land surface temperature databank contains monthly timescale mean, max, and min temperature for approximately 40,000 stations globally. It was developed as part of the International Surface Temperature Initiative. This is the global repository for all monthly timescale land surface observations from the 1800s to present and uses data deriving from sub-daily, daily, and monthly observations. It brings together data from more than 45 sources and is used in the creation of various integrated global temperature resources, most notably Global Historical Climatology Network Monthly (GHCN-M) v4. Stage 2 Data are processed into a standard format from Stage 2 Daily and Stage 1 Monthly files. Stage 2 data are not homogenized or processed beyond flagging for data provenance and data quality. Stage 2 daily data undergo some basic processes to convert observations into monthly data. See documentation for more information.

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: Stage 2 data is standardized and well-documented data that can be used by any scientist or researcher for climate research. For the ISTI/Global Surface Temperature Databank, this Stage 2 data will be processed later into Stage 3 data and, ultimately, for use in the Global Historical Climatology Network products.

gmd:name.gco:CharacterString: ISTI/Global Surface Temperature Databank FTP site

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: ISTI/Global Surface Temperature Databank FTP site

gmd:evaluationMethodDescription.gco:CharacterString: Not all sources have full coverage for time period available.

gmd:statement.gco:CharacterString:
Stage 2 data for the ISTI/Global Surface Temperature Databank is lightly processed data from the original Stage 1 sources. The processing involves only standardizing the data into a common format, removing extraneous data not used in the ISTI products, and, when necessary, flagged for provenance and potential quality issues.
Stage 2 Daily data is summarized into Stage 2 Monthly files. Refer to documentation for more information.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Stage 1 data is processed into a standard data format (consistent with long-term data use). Extraneous data is removed and, when necessary, data is flagged for provenance and potential quality issues. Stage 2 Daily data is summarized into Stage 2 Monthly files. Refer to documentation for more information.

gmd:rationale.gco:CharacterString: Data is only lightly processed to ensure that scientists and researchers have a common, consistent format. Stage 1 data is also available for questions about processing

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: DOC/NOAA/NESDIS/NCDC > National Climatic Data Center, NESDIS, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce
DOC/NOAA/NESDIS/NCDC > National Climatic Data Center, NESDIS, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce

gmd:other.gco:CharacterString: NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: NOAA created the National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI) by merging NOAA's National Climatic Data Center (NCDC), National Geophysical Data Center (NGDC), and National Oceanographic Data Center (NODC), including the National Coastal Data Development Center (NCDDC), per the Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2015, Public Law 113-235. NCEI launched publicly on April 22, 2015.

gmd:maintenanceNote.gco:CharacterString: Bulk metadata change applied on 2018-05-25. See version control repository history for metadata change details.
